WorkItem.Description: Between some releases, saved character data cannot be imported. Which is fine, XML changes happen. It would be nice if there was a way to only export the available item list so it could be re-imported later, as it can take me an hour to sort through and check off all my available gear again.

Comments.Message: Looking for the larger issue, are you saying that you could not load your char file into 2.3.8? Please post the char file and state what model.

And to side-step answer your issue: you can import your char from the armory (when it's not down for maintenance) and save a new file, then open the old one and new one side by side in notepad (the .xml files) and replace the new items available section with the old one and viola.
Certainly, I have been using the same character files for at least the last 10-15 versions (maybe longer).   If any of your saves are older than that then you should probably re-import anyway.
Yeah, character files are definitely compatible between versions.
I did end up editing them by hand and adding them in, but I no longer have the original XML file. I do tend to get that error a lot though, so I will post it the next time it happens.
